Key Match Events: Enner Valencia was booked and then sent off after a VAR review following a challenge on Kendry Paez.
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador was eventually pegged back and overcome by Venezuela, who recorded a famous victory, their first against Ecuador at a Copa since 2011.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kendry Paez played a key role in the game, showcasing his technical skills and energy despite his young age.
Jeremy Sarmiento scored the opening goal for Ecuador.
The weather conditions were hot, which affected the players' performance.
